text: I am Chilldur - Avenger of Arktiria.
The people of my planet were nearly extinquished
after an attack on a nearby mining facility.
The attack caused the facility to explode
and the burning wreckage fell on to the planet surface
Many cities and villages were destroyed
I was lucky that I was far away, on a mission
to guard our holy halls of Coldith.
The Technomancer told me that the attacker came from here:
I am here to revenge my kind.
Now prepare to die Cremorian Garbage.
